ext_weather.name: Tonight
ext_weather.shortForecast: Partly Cloudy then Slight Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
ext_weather.detailedForecast: A slight chance of showers and thunderstorms after 5am. Partly cloudy, with a low around 73. South wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%.
